text: Airavatesvara Temple is a Hindu temple of Dravidian architecture located in Kumbakonam, Thanjavur District in the South Indian state of Tamil Nadu. It was built by Rajaraja II in the 12th century CE. == References == Category:Hindu temples Category:Temples in India Category:Thanjavur district Category:World Heritage Sites in India Category:12th-century buildings and structures
title: Airavatesvara temple
